headline: Here's Why Hold Strategy is Apt for Stanley Black & Decker Stock Now
summary: SWK gains from its cost-saving measures, portfolio restructuring actions and pro-investor policies. Softness in its Tools & Outdoor unit and high debt are concerning.

headline: Generac Gains 28% in the Past Year: Will the Stock Maintain Pace in 2025?
summary: GNRC's strengthening residential business and acquisitions bode well amid weakness in the C&I segment.
